events.message: I received my order yesterday, but sadly the item is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund.
The customer's request was identified as a refund inquiry based on their mention of wanting money back.
Support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to process a refund for your recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product has been opened or used?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. I have not opened the package or used the product at all.
Thanks for the details. We can initiate a full refund for you once the item is returned in its original condition.
That sounds good, thank you. Please send me the return instructions and any shipping labels.
We have emailed you the return shipping label and instructions. Once we receive the item, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to see if you were able to send the return package and if you need any further assistance.
Yes, the package was shipped yesterday. I appreciate your help through this process.
The refund has been completed successfully and this case will now be closed. Thank you for your cooperation.
